Unbox Robotics - Executive Business Partner to the CTO

Location - Pune Office, Work Type: Full Time

Hr July 01, 2022

We at Unbox Robotics are revolutionizing warehouses and distribution centers by building the world's most compact, powerful, and flexible mobile robotics systems for the new age of warehousing. Our product is the World's 1st of its kind AI-powered parcel sorting robotic system that gets installed 10X faster, saves 50+% space and improves productivity by more than 3X with 50% fewer robots than that of the competition. Founded in 2019, we are backed by marquee investors and angels. We are looking to add to our team of thinkers, innovators and doers and would love to have you join us at the Pune, India office and build the future of on-demand robotics logistics solutions

Department

Human Resources

Work Experience

0-3 years of experience

Salary Range

Competitive Salary

Work Mode

In Campus

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Provide technical assistance functions to the CTO and administrative department.
  • Assist and support the CTO in their daily tasks.
  • Provide technical assistance to engineers and technicians in administrative matters.
  • Maintain and manage relevant technical databases.
  • Maintain and manage technical files and records in an organized manner.
  • Organize and schedule administrative meetings with technical persons.
  • Provide administrative support to the CTO.
  • Support and assist the administrative department in strategic direction making.
  • Ensure compliance of corporate guidelines in technical administrative assistant functions.

Requirements

  • High organizational skills along with the ability to process a lot of information
  • Ability to pay attention to detail
  • Ability to analyze and interpret datasets
  • Extremely fast learner and ability to work in dynamic fast paced environment
  • Excellent Communication skills

Good to Have:

  • Sound understanding of the fundamentals of Robotics and Automation

Eligible candidates:

  • Desired Qualification: B.Tech with MBA or equivalent is ideal
  • Work Experience: 0-3 years of experience

We Value:

  • Constant learner to become a Subject Matter Expert
  • Proven record in start-up environment working with innovations
  • Exposure to a high paced working environment
  • Ability to conduct detailed procedures in a time-constrained environment
Apply
